website_summaries.verdict: A foam mattress that works well for combination sleepers, cushioning pressure points while providing good back support.
pros: Not too firm but not too soft, this all-foam mattress conforms to the body while providing support to keep the spine aligned
Helps with hip and back pain
At 10 inches, it’s not too thick to climb out of each morning
cons: Tends to sleep warm, and some users find it too hot

customer_reviews.title: Great bed for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great mattress for the money. Well made and comfortable. Found that the 10 inch was a little firmer and better for our backs, so this 12 inch is moving to the guest bedroom. Both the 10 and 12 inch sleep better than our old pillow top spring mattress. Been a month now, 12 inch is too soft and edge support is insufficient for my 220 lbs. 10" was much better, love the 10" and cheaper. If your 100 lbs maybe the 12" is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas E. Buswell

customer_reviews.title: Does not expand to 8 inch!!
customer_reviews.text: I have kept it In a well ventilated room for over 72 hrs now, it has barely risen to 6 inch, but has a weird bump in the middle. I wanted a firm mattress and it might have been firm if it was 8 inch, but right now it just sags in the center. I wonder which "layer" didn't expand, is it the gel layer or what? Crazy, when you read similar reviews you think may be others had an odd one out, until it happens to you!! How do you return a mattress? Highly disappointed
customer_reviews.author: md

customer_reviews.title: It's hard to suck it up and admit when you're wrong
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to suck it up and admit when you're wrong, but this was a waste of money. I wanted this to be good. I really did. My back is killing me. It's like sleeping on the floor. Try to find one to try before you buy one.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew B

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this mattress! My husband doesn't snore as bad, I can't even feel him move around anymore (and he moves a lot in his sleep), plus we no longer wake up tired and in pain.
customer_reviews.author: Chihuahua Mama

customer_reviews.title: Still is holding up great. Still very comfy
customer_reviews.text: Have had this about 5 months. Still is holding up great. Still very comfy. Very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: 00 for it and was not really thrilled with it I just brought this one and I love it, just purchased a second one for guest ...
customer_reviews.text: I had a temperapedic mattress for about fifteen years and paid about 3500.00 for it and was not really thrilled with it I just brought this one and I love it, just purchased a second one for guest bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: dawn devito

customer_reviews.title: My kids bed is more comfortable then mine.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Not to soft and not to firm. If you like a hard firm bed this is not for you. It's firm enough to feel supported. Soft enough to form to your body your midsection sinks into the bed a little, your feet float. Lol
customer_reviews.author: S.a.

customer_reviews.title: Really disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Truly disappointed in this mattress. Ordered because of the high reviews. I received mine and immediately opened to expand. Didn't touch it for 5 days! And I didn't expand on the corners. It's an awful slop where my head should go. It feels terrible sleeping at an angle. Contacted seller and hope to have this resolved soon. Will update after
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a great buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wish they came as a two pack!!!!! This mattress is incredible. You will not find a better quality mattress for this price (or several times the price). The mattress does not have the normal chemical smell that foam mattresses can have. It arrived in a manageable box. It was easy for me to carry upstairs on my own. The mattress took a bit of time to relax and grow (expected). The mattress is supportive, but soft. The mattress is what I would describe as medium firm.
customer_reviews.author: Fellow Flyer

customer_reviews.title: CONTAINS AND LEAKS FIBERGLASS
customer_reviews.text: THIS MATTRESS CONTAINS FIBERGLASS. Do not buy from this brand or any foam mattress that contains fiberglass, It is hazardous to your health and the health of those around you! The inside of the outer cover is made up of 65% loose fiberglass. The outer cover does not prevent permeation of glass fibers into bedding and your skin. This is a very serious health hazard that potential buyers should be aware of. My partner and I lost 1/3 of our clothing, and all of our bedding because of this. This is a terrible low quality and HAZARDOUS ITEM you are selling Amazon. Amazon refused to post my last review so I'm rewriting this in a more concise way.
customer_reviews.author: The Hidden Church of the Holy Grail

customer_reviews.title: If you are sensitive to chemicals and respiratory issues - this is not the mattress for you, it will cause issues.
customer_reviews.text: What is this mattress made of? Seems to give us incredible respiratory allergies. After tearing our room apart and doing a process of elimination, from our leather bed frame, to steam cleaning our carpet, to our disbelief, its this mattress. Would like to return but there's no option. We bought this mattress because it boasts of having charcoal and green tea and all things natural when it is doing the EXACT OPPOSITE to us. Damn, what a bummer. Would like someone from manufacturer / support to contact us for a return on this.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Dog

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mattress. We ordered the 8" for our 5yr old daughter for $140. Her mattress was old and completely done. She has allergy issues and we came to find the old mattress was causing problems. She loves the new one and no more coughing or allergy issues! She is also a restless sleeper and she now sleeps later and wakes up less. We like the feel so much, we just picked a 12" Queen for our bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Mike D

customer_reviews.title: You Won’t Find Better Quality For The Price
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is absolutely worth purchasing. Don’t let the low price concern you. This is a QUALITY mattress that is exactly as described. It’s better than other mattresses that are considerably more expensive. It truly does keep you cool & offers a genuinely restful sleep experience. After sleeping on this mattress nightly for the past 6 months, it still feels the same as it did the first night. We’re looking to replace ALL our family’s mattresses with ones from Zinus.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Pain discomfort tossing and turning
customer_reviews.text: Well it's been just 2 yrs with this mattress ready to chuck it out the window! It has sunk sooo bad causing pain on my sides it's terrible! Flipped it to the other side ...just as bad ... Cant afford another mattress the company is making it very difficult to replace it..... Waste of money....
customer_reviews.author: nightowl

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful mattress
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 37yo 6'3" 225# male, I have this mattress on the bottom bunk of a basic Better Homes & Gardens bed. I have been sleeping on it regularly for the past 3 months and this thing is great! I wake up with less back discomfort after a night on this thing rather than our older pillow top queen mattress. It doesn't have a ton of edge support if you sit on it to get dressed or put on socks, but that isn't something I expected from a 6" mattress. I have been greatly impressed with the overall quality and am likely going to purchase a queen sized mattress from Zinus when it's time to upgrade our other mattress.
customer_reviews.author: K. Heuvelman

customer_reviews.title: HOT HOT HOT: Customer service did nothing to help me.
customer_reviews.text: I rarely leave negative reviews. This is an extremely hot mattress. That is, I sweat at night while in bed. YUCK. Nothing has helped--not a blanket on top, not another topper, nothing. I am not one who gets hot easily and have never had a complaint about a mattress before. I did, however, misunderstand the return policy. Its 100 day if purchased on Zinus.com but only 30 days if purchased on Amazon.com Caveat Emptor.
customer_reviews.author: Olga A.

customer_reviews.title: Great cheap mattress
customer_reviews.text: What a perfect mattress. I had $250 to spend, I bought this mattress, and now I'm happy. I actually prefer it to far more expensive memory foam brands. I left it in the box for around a week before unpacking as I was moving and had no trouble with inflating it. I also didn't notice any strange smells. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Edelen

customer_reviews.title: 1 year later- mold underneath
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress in March of 2019. Fast forward 1 year later, we are moving. When lifting the mattress we discovered in the center of the bottom side of mattress, mold had began to grow. This is the side facing the floor. It was on box springs, there was no mold on box springs. I can’t explain it. Nothing was wet under the mattress and it sat on box springs and had air flow under. Unless... it was already an issue when we received it and unknowingly turned into a bigger issue over the course of a year.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Hasal

customer_reviews.title: Great budget memory foam mattress
customer_reviews.text: You know, I came from a 10 inch mattress so I wasn't sure if I was going to like this firmness. However it's really not bad, and I don't feel incredible heat from the mattress either so I know the gel is working. I used to get numbness in my arms from laying on my side but I am not getting that from this mattress at all. It's actually quite comfortable and a steal for the price, especially if you like firm mattresses.
customer_reviews.author: Average Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Still love as much as day one 15 months later.
customer_reviews.text: I waited to review, mainly because mattresses are an over time thing. By far the best value for your money! I paired with a 14 inch zinus platform for a tall bed combo, much cheaper then you can find in any store. I was having trouble sleeping and lots of back pain. I changed the mattress and the pillows for a good nights rest! Can't go wrong with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: firm
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 10 inch, and this is thick enough. I also own the other zinus, which is an excellent mattress and a bit softer. This gel mattress is slightly cooler, has a unique size (like 1.5 inches longer all-around), and is firmer. If you have a tight bed frame like some ikea beds, then expect a little bit of bunching. If you like the pillow-top feeling, then go for zinus Deluxe Ultra (10 inches is plenty)
customer_reviews.author: kuken5

customer_reviews.title: I will never go back to a spring mattress.
customer_reviews.text: I waited several weeks to give my review so I would have plenty of nights sleeping on this. I was wary about getting a foam mattress after reading other reviews but I am so glad I got this one. Took only a few hours for it to totally expand. No odor. Very comfortable. I have a bad hip and since I got this mattress I don't wake up sore in the morning. It has been years since I felt this good when I wake up. Husband weighs 275lb and he finds this comfortable too. I loved this one so much I bought a second one for the other bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Lora

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress, just struggling to adjust.
customer_reviews.text: I love this mattress. It's super comfortable and when I lay on it, it provides relief. It started to puff up unevenly but eventually evened out. I'm also not has hot and sweaty at night with this mattress (I'm a large woman and get hot easily). It also has no motion transfer so when I jump on the bed, my pets don't go flying off. I'm just struggling to adjust the new mattress. I also feel like my sleep quality in general is effected because of my lack of routine (gotta love COVID). Will update as I start to get adjusted.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Martha

customer_reviews.title: A Moderately Firm Mattress
customer_reviews.text: Bought Qn Size for a small bedroom. We are male/female couple weight 138 and 165, 5'5 and 5'3". Pros: This arrived quickly and when unwrapping it expands quickly Fully expanded in 4 hours to 12 inches Medium firm - cannot feel when spouse gets in or out of bed Memory foam is still supportive, doesn't leave us sinking Using on a platform vs box spring allows for a lot more room under bed Purchased on recommendation from a parent that runs a bed and breakfast and has received MANY compliments from her customers about the quality of mattress Affordable The sleeve can be zipped off and removed for washing Cons Package was nearly destroyed when it arrived at my house
customer_reviews.author: Rick and Ashly

customer_reviews.title: Sucks
customer_reviews.text: Highly doubt this is 6”. Came on time no issue with damage box or item. Bought this for my son who transitioned into an “adult” bed, he had a previous foam mattress which was 5” purchased from wayfair that got ruin in our move so we got this one since price was right and reviews were good, but the mattress is not 6” and it’s not even close to medium firm. The mattress is so THIN and SOFT you can feel the ribs from the slates while u lay on it. Too bad this type of item suck for returning now I have to figure out how to fix this situation
customer_reviews.author: BAC

customer_reviews.title: Did not properly decompress
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, even after removing mattress from packaging and following all instructions, our mattress did not properly decompress. Corners are all misshapen and overall thickness of mattress only reached 10 inches even though we ordered the 12 inch. Mattress, as pictured, is 4 different layers of foam, these foam layers sit together unevenly and give an overall unfinished and sloppy look to the mattress. Appears to be egg crate foam sheets. We have purchased other products from Zinus and been very pleased with them. While I wasn't please with this product, Amazon customer service was very helpful in resolving our problem.
customer_reviews.author: Customer 12345

customer_reviews.title: Received a used one!
customer_reviews.text: Be careful and inspect what you order. The first time I purchased this mattress I realized it had bed bugs. I gave it a second chance, returned and repurchased ones. The second one came and it was markedly used. It came in a damaged box not from the manufacturer with multiple old labels, it was obviously redeflated because it was nearly twice as big as the first one, and had marked dirt on it. Not sure what happened because I was really looking forward to using this mattress, but be careful and make sure to inspect it!!
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle Brakoniecki

customer_reviews.title: Don’t dismiss the bad reviews
customer_reviews.text: The edges of the bed never got past 4 1/2” on the 8” bed, so the bed is allot higher in the middle then the ends so your feet and head are lower. I ordered because all the posistive reviews and hoped the negatives where just a few bad mattress’s. Seems like it could be a comfortable bed if it actually got to the 8” on the corners.
customer_reviews.author: nickia

customer_reviews.title: The King Size is Terrible.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this same mattress in a Full size for our daughter and her mattress is wonderful. So we bought it as a King size for ourselves and we have hated it everyday since the day we got it which is about three years ago now. It has destroyed our backs and sleep. We could sleep on the wood floor and get better sleep. My husband loves a firm mattress but even he can’t stand this mattress. I’m not sure why it is so different from the full size with regard to comfort, but they are nothing a like.
customer_reviews.author: The Brown Family

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I loveeeeeeeeee this mattress! I was a little scared but after all the research, this was the best one! The mattress is firm but soft! I allowed it to expand to size for 24 hours and it match the measurements in the description. I'm about 220 and my boyfriend is around the same and we both sleep comfortably in this bed together. It doesn't make you sink in while you sleep, its doesn't cause you to sweat, and it causes you to stay sleep the whole night! I have not experience any pain since I've started using this mattress! I highly recommend this mattress if you are looking for something to improve your sleep quality!
customer_reviews.author: Zhivon Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Beware the fake warranty
customer_reviews.text: This companies warranty is a scam. It says 10 years of warranty however despite it being in stock on amazon if you try to file a claim because of significant sagging, even if they approve your warranty request, they'll give you the runaround and the item is ALWAYS OUT OF STOCK. That's how they are able to avoid all warranty claims. This item basically has ZERO years warranty. My warranty claim was due to significant sagging that happened after just 1.5 years making it unusable. My 10inch mattress is now 6.5- 7 inches.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: wonderful. and arrived one day early!
customer_reviews.text: of course, i've only had it one day. but it puffed up to full height in less than 8 hours. Slept on it last night. so comfortable! .... because i have joint issues now and they felt so supported. much better than the traditional mattress i have that has springs in it. and the price was unbelievable for the value. will update after i've had it a while, but i couldn't be happier with this choice.
customer_reviews.author: E. Desterno

customer_reviews.title: Firm as hell. Not as comfortable as the Zinus Ultima mattresses
customer_reviews.text: This mattress gets a few stars for being well-packaged and trouble-free, as all Zinus mattresses I’ve bought through the years... however.. it’s incredibly firm to the point of discomfort and constantly rolling around to alleviate it. Put your elbow into the mattress and put all your weight on it - a few inches of deflection. If you told me that this was a 2” mattress topper on top of a sheet of plywood, I’d believe you. I have the 8” Zinus Ultima Comfort in my camper van and it is leaps and bounds more comfortable and softer than this... but, alas- I’m stuck with it. Maybe I’ll get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hawthorne

customer_reviews.title: NEVER AGAIN!
customer_reviews.text: Unless you like a hard bed then this is NOT the mattress for you. Don’t waste your time. Go to a mattress store and lay on different beds to see what works for you. I bought two beds one for my 13 year old and one for myself. If I could give ZERO stars for both mattresses I would.The first couple nights it was fine,but from then mine and my daughter woke up so sore every where. Let’s put it this way it’s slightly softer than sleeping on the floor. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: Krissy12345

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Blend of firm/Secure and Sink-into-Cloud Sensations
customer_reviews.text: Love this new mattress - was surprised it enlarged so quickly - almost instantly - so be prepared. No odor (except for the plastic its wrapped in), and the comfort is fascinating. I bought this because someone mentioned it was firm, and they are correct, but there's also 4.5 inches of gel/mem foam and comfort foam that are soft. When you get up, you can actually see the bed linens move as the bed adjust back to normal. It is very cool and comforting to sleep on. Remember the thickness of the mattress you purchase should be dictated by the weight that will be on it every night, just FYI. The cat won't stay off it : )
customer_reviews.author: DustyFish

customer_reviews.title: I will never buy from a mattress factory again!!
customer_reviews.text: Can i just take a minute and just say WOOOW!! I bought this to complete my guest room. This mattress is AWESOME!! I'm actually going to purchase this same mattress in a different size for my master bedroom!! My room!! Its thick plush firm but still soft. It rivals those luxury mattresses at the furniture stores I've been looking at and trying out. Please give this mattress a try it's an excellent buy. I was a lil afraid based on some of the reviews BUT the majority of the reviews were positive so i took a chance!! So very glad I did !!! Worth Every dollar !! And shipping and delivery is excellent
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: HARD AS A ROCK
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed to replace my twin xl Zinus because I moved to a bigger apartment. It had great reviews and I already owned a Zinus mattress before so I trusted it would be comfortable. This thing is hard as a rock. It’s like sleeping directly on the floor. The only thing as advertised is the cooling gel. I’ve had this bed for nearly a week now and I haven’t gotten hot at night once. However, I have also not gotten a wink of good sleep in nearly a week. Extremely surprised and disappointed by Zinus here. Not worth a dime, shop elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Peter T

customer_reviews.title: Epic fail
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend bought this mattress and it was so amazing, I decided to buy it too. Mine never fully inflated. The corners never popped up and have stayed at 5 &1/2 inches! The center of the bed never inflated beyond 7inches! So frustrating and it’s been 5 days! I’m going through the manufacturers warranty to process a return- will try it one more time, and hopefully get a good one this time!
customer_reviews.author: Car Mel

customer_reviews.title: Most important to
customer_reviews.text: Today July 16th I picked my bed up from Post office. I am 8 months pregnant! And was able to carry this by myself to my car and then carry it up two flights of stairs to my apartment. Very light! It’s firm which is perfect for me as I’ve been having issues getting up due to being pregnant with sciatic pain, and generally having a big belly weighing me back down (haha) I didn’t give it the full 24 hours to “fluff” up but it definitely has risen to the 6” it says it should be. Overall I’m happy with my purchase. Will update if any issues arise
customer_reviews.author: J. Deluca

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase of my life
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, this is the best purchase of my adult life. I was on the fence with the price being so much lower than the competition. But this mattress changed my life. So much so that I will be buying my boyfriend one because I can't stand the thought of spending the night on his non-memory foam mattress. It fully inflated in about 8 hours, but I let it sit about 36 to be safe, and there were no weird smells. It's been over a month and this thing is still the best sleep I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Arnold

customer_reviews.title: ... firmer than expected (about 8/10 in firmness) but a great deal nonetheless when compared to name brand alternatives
customer_reviews.text: Much firmer than expected (about 8/10 in firmness) but a great deal nonetheless when compared to name brand alternatives. I'm keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: TRUMP 2020

customer_reviews.title: No good so far
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5 days- more than 120 hours from unpackaging 3 of theses mattresses and allowing them to sit and inflate. THEY ARE NOWHWERE CLOSE TO 12”. They are @ 6 inches in the corners, completely uneven, not flat and in no way usable at all. I’m really thinking these will have to be returned... completely unusable at this point
customer_reviews.author: T Smith

customer_reviews.title: Decent at first but left you wanting more by the end of the year.
customer_reviews.text: Originally we loved the bed. A few months in we noticed some curving on the bed where we laid at. Found out we couldn’t flip the bed because it wasn’t a square. (We have a king and previous king mattresses were squared for easier rotating.) So we turned it and that helped. Fast forward to a year and we can’t take it anymore. The bed sags significantly and we are average weighted couple. No longer comfortable and toss and turn all night. My husband wakes up often due to shoulder and back pain after sleeping on the bed. Definitely don’t recommend for longer than a year if you have to buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Defective item Decompression issue
customer_reviews.text: I received a defective piece. The mattress did not decompress perfectly on one edge. I guess the plastic wrap already had a leak in it. Due to the decompression issue, one edge of the mattress is at different height than the rest, making the entire mattress looks slant. Contacted the manufacturer, this was the reply "The decompression issue is most likely due to Amazon not shipping the product in time and the shelf life may have expired."
customer_reviews.author: D B Paul

customer_reviews.title: Started off great ... but then started to sag
customer_reviews.text: After about a year I'm looking for a new mattress. This started off feeling wonderfully firm, but soon began to develop permanent soft spots just where support is needed (hips, lower back), even though I was very careful not to sit on the bed or put extra pressure on the middle. I am 190 lbs but >6 foot tall, so not all my weight is in the middle. Now I have to scoot over to locate the "uncompressed" areas in order to get to sleep. The foam simply cannot maintain sufficient "rebound" over time when compared to steel coils.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUserName

customer_reviews.title: Sleep Nirvana, finally!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a wonderful queen memory foam mattress that is gel infused AND CertiPUR certified AND won't cost a lot, then look no further! This mattress has truly changed our lives -- it is so comfortable and we sleep so much more soundly and with no pain when we wake up! Gone is my back pain from a regular mattress and also my wife's shoulder pains. The thickness of 10 inches is just right, too. It's hard enough getting a fitted sheet onto this mattress, but it would be even harder with a 12 inch one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this mattress!!
customer_reviews.text: For the money, this mattress is amazing. I've owned Tempur-Pedic and Serta in the past. This mattress provides more support and has just enough "soft" to be comfortable. I used to toss and turn (or flop, as my wife calls it), but for the past week I've slept straight through 8 hours with very minimal movement. I'm a side & back sleeper and it's perfect for me. I'm 6'3"/250 lbs. We slept on our mattress the first night we got it and have had no problems at all. The box was very best up but the mattress was untouched. By far one of the best investments we've made.
customer_reviews.author: Trav_Jax

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS BED!!!
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for a few months now. (Please excuse messiness). First off, this mattress in the box was HEAVY. You'd for sure need help moving it. It expanded to 10-11 inches. At first it felt very firm and I was scared we'd have to send it back, HOWEVER the next morning I felt AMAZING. My boyfriend has chronic low back pain and this is the first mattress we've had where he said his back pain from sleeping is minimal to gone. You get used to the moderate firmness and it's very very comfortable. Very HIGH QUALITY for the price. I'll never get a mattress from a store again.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron G

customer_reviews.title: Barely lasted a year
customer_reviews.text: This was really comfy at first and I loved it. But after about 8 months the foam started to weaken in the center where I normally lay. At this point it's been just under a year since I bought it and it already needs to be replaced. I can't sleep normally anymore without it hurting because of how worn down the foam has gotten just from me using it. I shouldn't have gone so cheap and should have just spent the extra money for one of better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Arcaderat

customer_reviews.title: Lives Up to Description
customer_reviews.text: Needed a guest bed, I was scared by a couple of 1-star reviews. My experience: Showed up quick, unrolled, took full shape immediately, let it "sit" for 2 days, as recommended, but probably not needed. Very faint smell is pleasant. This mattress is firmer (as described) than my other memory foam so I may end up using it for myself and let the guests have the softer one. Don't be afraid of the negative reviews. The papers that came with it indicate the company is a 'new age' type outfit, aiming to please. I rarely write a review, felt compelled, since I generally focus on the 1-star reviews before I buy. All smiles!
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids room
customer_reviews.text: This review is based on price to quality. Across the board this is 5 star perfect mattress for the price. Surprisingly firm, and easy to unpackage. I’m also excited about the free large piece of plastic the mattress is wrapped in (drop cloths are expensive and this makes a perfect drop cloth for paint projects) I got 1 for each of my daughters they are both 60-80lbs so it works. This will last until highschool the twin beds and headboards I bought from our local furniture store were $500 each. Quality was so so. These are so so for 1/5 of the cost. I’ll take it.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriella Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Love.
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from a queen Zinus to a king. Loving the extra space, especially during the stay-at-home order. We're already together all day, need that extra space to roll away at night. It's like laying on a cloud. Comfiest mattress I've ever been on. Makes no noise. Love it, I am insomniac and I get my best sleep since purchasing this mattress. I did opt for the gel-infused (for cooling) and I notice no difference whatsoever from this and the Green Tea mattress without the gel-infusion. This is why this mattress is a 4 star not a 5 star from me. Solid purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Antonia Block

customer_reviews.title: HARD! No pressure relieving foam!
customer_reviews.text: I thought this had a soft layer pressure point relief. If I lay on my side, my hip touches and my knee touches and because the mattress is so HARD my ankle is off the bed. This pust additional pressure on my hip and knee and puts strain on my knee because the lower leg is in the air. I am very disappointed at how hard and uncomfortable this bed is. There cannot be 3 inches of soft foam at the top. You can barely make a hand indent when you push down. Price was good but then I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Brand Loyalist
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased several varieties of these mattresses for different purposes; guest room, vacation homes, bunk beds, etc. Different sizes and thicknesses. Have not been disappointed. I really appreciate the comfort and durability at this price point. In fact, every single time I suffer through the irritation of lifting and maneuvering my 3 ton king size Tempurpedic bed in order to change the sheets on the bed I personally use, I think about how lightweight and comfortable this mattress is and promise myself it will be the next one I buy for me.
customer_reviews.author: J9

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress for such a low price!
customer_reviews.text: High quality memory foam mattress for a much lower price than other brands (and I search extensively at multiple stores too). I must have one that has the quality due to health issues and I use this on an adjustable hospital bed. Works great and is so comfortable! Has a very nice covering on it which protects the foam from the springs on this type of bed. It's nice to get quality at such a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: jmw

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress! Definitely on par with the more expensive ones!
customer_reviews.text: Omg!!!!! This is seriously such a great mattress for the price!!!! Actually it's just a plan amazing mattress! We just switched from the Purple mattress, which was causing me a lot of hip pain (a lot of people love the Purple, but it just did not work for me), and I didn't want to throw a whole bunch of money away for another mattress that just wouldn't work. So glad that I found this! It is definitely worth it! Only thing I can say is that it does ten to be a bit hotter then the purple, but sooooooo much more comfortable!!!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Sanabria

customer_reviews.title: A bust!
customer_reviews.text: After 3 days, corners were about 5 inches deep and whole mattress never got to 10 inches. A real bust. Amazon to pick up in a couple days. Great service (You've got to call them, folks). In all fairness, I have the King version of a non-gel Zinus mattress and its wonderful. Also, their frames are superb.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super hard bed
customer_reviews.text: Nice, large, thick bed. Quite a hard bed though, similar to sleeping on the floor. Virtually no give at all, certainly not as much give as pictured on their website. In order to send back you have to purchase a very large and expensive box, so we ended up just keeping it. Bought a foam topper in addition to the bed so that my husband could sleep, works well enough!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable mattress
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mattress for the guest bed. Yes, there's a stench to it due to the shipping method, but it goes away after a few days in the room with the window open and good airflow. It's pretty comfortable and VERY soft. The cons: The corners and some of the side of the bed never fully inflated, even after 2 years. Over these two years, the mattress has become increasingly uncomfortable. My guests tell me that the bed is comfortable after the first night, but becomes less comfortable the more that they sleep in it.
customer_reviews.author: Borsalino A.

customer_reviews.title: Twin is perfect  for kids.
customer_reviews.text: My kids (7, 4 & 3 yr olds) love this matters and have gotten wonderful sleep on them. It has a nice thickness to it and it's too firm/hard. It's kind of like a cushioning medium-firm though more on the firm side then the medium side. The three mattress we ordered had no funny smell. The twin size is perfect for kids and bunk beds.
customer_reviews.author: SarahTop Contributor: Watercolor Painting

customer_reviews.title: Extremely soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Mine came exactly 8 inch which is what i ordered, i measured it after a few hours after seeing many complaints theirs didn't rebound to proper size. I am guessing they measured it after a few minutes and needed to wait. No bad smell either just a normal new mattress smell. Fair price and a way way better alternative to spending hundreds more on a normal spring mattress. These are more comfortable anyways, you don't need springs. Springs are a thing of the past that needs to die. It's cheaper and more comfortable to use different layers of foam and gel.
customer_reviews.author: johnny

customer_reviews.title: Hard but great quality
customer_reviews.text: Pro: this bed expanded in less than 30 mins, you don’t need to wait for 24 hours. And it does not have any smell what so ever! This has been a major problem for any foam bed I bought in the past. It is very cool temperature wise and perfect for people who don’t like to sleep on warm bed. Con: it is hard bed, I hope in time, it will be soft, but for foam mattress, you barely feel any softness. It feels like this is made in wood. Overall, it truly worth the price we paid.
customer_reviews.author: M&M

customer_reviews.title: Sleeps cool may not be for full size folks.
customer_reviews.text: Overall a not half bad mattress for the price. 2 yrs of relatively good and cool sleep. On the 12in thick green tea mattress. At the 2-1/2 year Mark are submitting for a warranty replacement as it is sagging and we are waking up sore. Not sure if is because we are larger folks 200-240 lbs will update as we find out more with warranty support.
customer_reviews.author: Suttab

customer_reviews.title: Useless and Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased Zinus King Mattress about a year and half ago. That was nothing but piece of junk which gave nothing but painful back sleeps. After doing too much research and reading reviews I thought to give it another chance and purchased this Queen Size. I thought that this is Firm as the review and details said so. But this is another piece of junk. I wake up with Back Pain. They probably don't know what a Firm Mattress means. Also the width is 59" and and not 60". This is rip off. It's short on my bed. I am returning it. Not Comfortable at all. Don't waste your money on any Zinus Products.
customer_reviews.author: User@123

customer_reviews.title: Zero "cooling" experience - SO DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: I have been sleeping on my new 12" "cooling gel" mattress for a month now. You can NOT feel the "cool" through the cover, nor can you obviously when you put the fitted sheet on the mattress. Very disappointed because I specifically bought this particular one for the "cooling" effect. I have had a mattress topper "Sharper Image" before it and was great. You could feel the gel cooling layer & it's effect through the mattress protector and the fitted sheet on top of that. Now what?
customer_reviews.author: Kayos

customer_reviews.title: Too Firm = Back Pain
customer_reviews.text: 10’ is way too firm. I waited past the return window because I wanted to give this bed a chance. I’ve read that foam mattresses take time to break in, but it has been uncomfortable since day 1. I have had extreme upper back pain for 3 weeks, and I’ve never had back pain in my life. I’m 28 years old and have always slept great. Not with this bed. Please avoid the 10’ bed. I’ve wasted a lot of money on this bed. I am very disappointed after reading all of the positive reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Racheal Stottern

customer_reviews.title: On the medium-firm side, great value!
customer_reviews.text: I thought this mattress would be a little softer. It doesn’t quite sink in and cradle you the way I hoped. However, it is comfortable and it’s for my guest room / AirBnB so I am thrilled to have a brand new mattress in there at an awesome price. It started expanding immediately when I ripped the plastic and doesn’t have a strong smell at all. I put bedding on it immediately and you’d never know it just came out of the box. Very happy with this purchase but if I were sleeping on it nightly, I’d want a softer mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Meg M.

customer_reviews.title: Great budget price for a very good mattress
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly very good product for the price. Delivered in a timely manner, super easy to unpack and it decompressed fully in half the time expected. I didn’t notice any odor, it smelled like pretty much any new foam product might and that smell was gone in minutes. I am a side sleeper and often have shoulder and hip pain. Both have diminished by 90% since sleeping on this mattress. Our previous mattress was from Ikea, a coil/foam hybrid whose sides collapsed within three years. I am reserving a 5 star rating here because ou time with tell if this mattress will have any longevity. Right now it is about a month old and we love it.
customer_reviews.author: HollenWood

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: We didn’t sleep on it for the recommended 72hrs. It expanded like a very bad cake. Middle was high and slopes down all the sides. The corners never raised past 7. We purchased the 12 in. King. The highest point was 9 on one side in the middle. The mattress itself was like laying a comforter on the floor. Very firm with no give.very disappointing. We are currently waiting on refund and sleeping on our couch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Affordable • comfy • Best mattress brand out there
customer_reviews.text: This is our 3rd Zinus mattress. Not because we go through them. But because we buy them for each room! They are the most comfy beds out there. Very affordable for the product your getting. This mattress was true to size and perfect for our guest bedroom trundle bed. All of our guests that come to stay rave about the sleep they got. A few of them have purchased a zinus mattress after staying over. Highly recommend! You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: AlexisCline

customer_reviews.title: Mattress is snug
customer_reviews.text: So far I really enjoy this mattress. I’m overweight and worried I would sink. It feels like floating on a cloud. My sleep has changed dramatically, no more tossing and turning. Belly sleep has turned to back and side. It feels like the bed hugs my body. I ordered the 8 inch gel infused mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: I have three of these
customer_reviews.text: The first one of these i purchased was a thinner full for camping. It fit my truckbed perfect. I used it for several years and loved it. Several friends got the same one and were also thrilled. This spring we decided to add a guest bed so bought the same one in 10" and again love it. We end up using it for naps and if one of us is feeling under the weather as well. We loved it so much we upgraded out king bed to the same mattress and could not be happier.
customer_reviews.author: K-ride

customer_reviews.title: Very FIRM - LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY like this mattress. It's only been about a week, so I can't really speak on long term use, but so far we love it. It is a VERY firm mattress. But still soft. just not like, structurally sink into it soft. Make sense? Lol. It's exactly what i was looking for. I wish i had gotten the 12 inch now because I feel so low to the ground (came from box springs and coil mattress on high bed frame. No qulams at all! And for the price - who cares if I start sinking in in a couple of years. I'll just buy a new one!
customer_reviews.author: Joey W.

customer_reviews.title: Very hard mattress.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very timely. Product seems to be of good quality. Purchased to put in RV. The mattress expanded to full height and looks great. Unfortunately, this mattress is so hard that neither my wife nor I can sleep comfortably on it. Caused pain in our hips and shoulders. We are going to try to correct the problem by adding a plush topper. The cost of the mattress was under $200 and the cost of a plush topper is about the same. All in all we will still have paid less that $500 for a comfy mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Spirithdmc

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort and quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is extremely comfortable for the price. I was very pleasantly surprised with it. I was a little worried buying a 6 inch mattress, but it’s just the right amount of soft, and still very supportive. I can’t feel slats underneath me or anything. Great mattress for the price! Definitely recommend. Because this is not a natural product, I would definitely recommend buying a mattress protector. Not just to protect the mattress, but to protect you from the mattress too (memory foam= chemicals) thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: Like sleeping on a cloud!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mattress! I keep thinking I'm waking up in a high-end hotel! This is the most comfortable bed I've ever had. We got it and opened it up and it inflated in about five hours so we we able to sleep on it that night. This is the first time in years I have woken up with out back pain! It's soft but supportive. I would not hesitate it endorse this or buy it again. I have spent hundred more on other mattresses and never had one this comfortable! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best mattress ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best mattress ever! Finally a firm supportive cooling mattress. If you want to sink into a mattress this is not for you. It’s firm as far as support and the gel layer makes it cool to sleep on. Best purchase I’ve made! No more back or hip pain. I sleep so well on it. And you can’t beat the price. It was delivered at 7 in the morning. Took it out and set it up. There was zero smell to it. Slept on it that night. Just wish zinus made pillows!
customer_reviews.author: tm

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive mattress that is not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress because I was on a budget and this mattress was cheap. I really wanted to like this mattress but unfortunately it is NOT comfortable. When you sleep on this mattress it retains your body heat which is the opposite of what I was looking for. The mattress is also the most firm mattress I've ever slept on. It's impressive how firm this is but unfortunately that also means it's not comfortable. I realized I was taking a gamble by buying a mattress that was cheap and in my case I lost.
customer_reviews.author: The Angry IT

customer_reviews.title: NOT PLUSH. IT IS FIRM
customer_reviews.text: <12inch queen size> I am 104lb sidesleeper. My old memory foam mattress was plush so i know what is plush. It is FIRM. Not plush. I've got a backache after sleeping. Was going to return this but I watched a YouTube video to figure out how to put this mattress in the box again and realized it's a lot of work (almost impossible) so just i added a mattress topper (the total cost is still cheaper than buying offline). And still there are wrinkles on all 4 corners of mattress cover because it wasn't expanded completely and all the corners appeared squashed. (it's been 2weeks) Will never buy a mattress on online.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Good online mattress option
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical to buy a mattress online but my friends have loved them so I thought I would try! I am used to a softer mattress so I'm still adjusting to the firmness of this one, but overall its been great for a month. Cool process to watch it rise after unpacking. The company includes little thank you notes which i thought was a nice gesture. It's great to be able to purchase online and not have to go lay on a bunch of mattresses during a pandemic.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Perez

customer_reviews.title: This Bed is Amazing...
customer_reviews.text: This was the third Zinus bed I have purchased. Just purchased the fourth for my elderly mother. I had a bed that I loved and thought was comfortable but my low back hurt. So I purchased the 1st Zinus 12" green tea memory foam bed about 6 months ago. No low back pain. I bought two more for my Florida condo, and just bought my girlfriend one for her new house. You cannot beat the quality or the price, I guarantee it. I promise I am not connected to Zinus and I rarely write reviews but this thing saved my back.
customer_reviews.author: Keenan Post

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and a good price
customer_reviews.text: Took several days to fully expand to 12". Arrived with some minor cosmetic shipping damage, appears that their machine tore a small hold in the inner bag which may have allowed the plastic to move against the fabric. No damage to material that I could detect. Got several pictures in case I need to warranty. Make sure to put a mattress pad on it, if you read the warranty it states "It is incumbent on the consumer to protect the mattress with a stain resistant pad." Been sleeping on it for about a week. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Wat Tyler

customer_reviews.title: It is not plush or comfortable like other mattresses I've had
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is VERY hard. I've woke up with back pain twice after a night's sleep on it. It is not plush or comfortable like other mattresses I've had. I'm very disappointed and can not return it because it is too large. I would not buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This mattress is better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a 6 inch thick version of this mattress and it is so comfortable. We needed a new mattress for our camper and didn't want to pay the prices that camping supply stores wanted to charge. Several reviews mentioned using this mattress in their campers. I am a large woman and usually find thinner mattress compress so much that I feel the hard surface underneath the mattress. NOT the case with this one. It seems firm at first, but it soon conforms to your body and supports everything! No aching hips, knees, shoulders or back! I highly recommend this mattress!
customer_reviews.author: drw

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress for a light person at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my young son of about 80 Lbs. He loves it and pretends that it keeps him super cool at night. If you're heavier, (I'm 240 Lbs.) it will make you sink quite considerably, so I would not recommend this for adults. I will say that Zinus is a great brand and their quality, packaging, and warrantees are fantastic. Unrelated but the frame I bought for this bed sold me on their products for anything I may need that they provide for the considerable future. Great for Light people and kids, comfortable, lavender scent is some kinda marketing garbage it wears off when the horrible stink of a foam mattress does. I recommend this bed and brand.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Give it plenty of time to expand.
customer_reviews.text: We opened the mattress as soon as we received it and it expanded to only 11 inches the first day. It took several days to expand to the full 12 inches. It is a very comfortable mattress at an amazing price. I can't imagine that buying a more expensive mattress could be any more comfortable. I can't speak to the durability of the mattress, but compared to some of the more expensive mattress I could buy a new one every few years and still have less money invested than buying a network tv advertised brand. Our mattress is on a solid base, and I think that is important to the function of the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Flanagan

customer_reviews.title: Best sleep of my life but with some caveats
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is the absolute best mattress I've ever slept on. I have spent a load of money on other mattresses, some high tech, some plain and simply stupid. I've slept on everything from concrete to Egyptian silks. This mattress is so simply comfortable and supportive. However there are some caveats. It is supposed to smell like green tea, but ends up smelling like Windex. Sometimes it takes a week to expand fully (mine has stopped at 11.5 inches). The "cooling gel" doesn't always work. I love this mattress, but the minor draw backs keep an otherwise excellent mattress drowning in mediocrity.
customer_reviews.author: John Faust

customer_reviews.title: Best bed we have ever slept on
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I bought the 12 inch gel infused queen mattress back in October of 2017 and it is now May 2020. This is by far the best bed we have ever slept in and after three years, it is still just as comfortable as the day we bought it. We have not noticed any deterioration of the materials in any way. We travel a lot for business and every time we are at a hotel we can’t wait to get back home and sleep in this bed. HIGHLY recommended. My parents also bought one and have the same experience/opinion. This bed is worth 10x the price they are selling it for.
customer_reviews.author: Walter J Estrada

customer_reviews.title: The mattress does not hold up, do not buy this mattress.
customer_reviews.text: This mattress was such a disappointment. We have had it two years and it is already time to replace it. It took months for the odor to dissipate but that was nothing compared to the mattress itself. One side of the mattress is sunken while the other side is a hump. There is a definite incline from the sunken side to the other side and when laying on the higher side you have the feeling of rolling down. The humped side is also hard while the other side is quite bouncy. I have rotated the mattress as instructed but it hasn’t made a difference. Do not buy this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Debby Loggans

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to return
customer_reviews.text: Bought this thinking it would help relieve some back pain but found that it was too soft for my liking. Tried to return using UPS as is instructed to do so and found that UPS refuses to return it on the grounds that it is too big. It’s been impossible to return as no UPS will accept it even though I’ve gone so far as to decompressing it and rolling it back up. Would not recommend buying, this has been the worst return experience ever.
customer_reviews.author: Gaby

customer_reviews.title: Look away...
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money, please. Just don’t. We landed on this mattress for the great reviews. I started having back pain because of our old mattress and now my lower back pain is even worse. I didn’t think it could get worse. This bed is as hard as a rock. It’s been about two weeks now, don’t see it getting any better for us. I’m a 5’5” 125 lb. woman. My husband is 6’1” 195 lbs. and also hates this mattress. Wish so badly I could return it and get our money back. Don’t get it. Look away.
customer_reviews.author: embry24

customer_reviews.title: Great bed for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I've only slept on this bed for a week, but I'm liking it so far. The bed is firm enough if you like that. I let mine sit and expand for over 48 hours before putting the mattress protector on. I didn't have any issues with the bed expanding unevenly. I'm sure that letting it expand for the full 48 hours before using the mattress helped with that. Overall, I've been really enjoying this mattress and for the price that I paid, it's a steal.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: This mattress is wider than a traditional full-sized mattress.
customer_reviews.text: Much to my chagrin, when I placed this mattress on our full-sized set of box springs, it overhung the mattress by at least 6 inches. My full-sized sheets did not fit. Fortunately, I had some queen-sized sheets that I use with our sofa-bed mattress, and they fit. Double-check the dimensions before ordering. Now, I have to order a wider foundation in order to keep this mattress. The mattress itself is exactly as comfortable as expected. The quality is equal to the king-sized mattress that I ordered from Zinus a couple of years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Three

customer_reviews.title: Hard and hot
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an affordable firm mattress to replace my old one. This is cheap and came quickly but if you live anywhere warm and humid you will wake up with whichever side of you that was in contact with the mattress being soaked in sweat. It is also very hard and uncomfortable if you have wide hips or a prominent bottom. Your curves won’t be accommodated by the hard mattress and your spine will be bent all night. I’ve had it for over a year and it has barely softened at all. It was affordable but I really need to replace it with something that would work better for my body and climate.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Add a topper and it’ll be best sleep ever!
customer_reviews.text: My findings: I really like an additional 3 inch foam topper no matter what mattress I buy, so I got this 8” one with the intention of investing in the extra ~$80 dollars into a 3” topper. Result: significantly better than the 12” mattress without a topper. I didn’t tell my guests any of the differences of the mattresses In my house (4) and the guests sleeping on the 8” mattress with the 3” additional topper immediately asked about it because it was the best sleep they’d had in years. I concur! Winner winner chicken dinner
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Too firm, sizing issues
customer_reviews.text: If it didn’t seem like a huge hassle logistically, I would return this mattress. It looks pretty and is covered in a soft breathable material. However: 1) It’s about 0.5-0.75” too wide for the bed frame (but can be tucked in, so that doesn’t bother me. It mainly annoys my husband). 2) It’s just too hard. It’s not comfortable to sleep on. I like firm mattresses but this one is just difficult to sleep on.
customer_reviews.author: Str8t2thePoint

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this based on price and reviews. I sure was wrong on both. I usually don't give not good reviews, but this one I definitely wanted to give. I purchased this based on manufacturer's description as 6 inches....eeehhhh....false. I left it out for over 24 hours and it still not even to the thickness of 5 inches. False advertising anyone or did I receive a defect. There is still a slight odor of something I would say similar to mildew/chemical. Definitely will not purchase this brand again. As for lying on it, it was ok and not the greatest as advertised...beats lying on the floor though.
customer_reviews.author: Customer2012

customer_reviews.title: No smell! Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great little mattress! We purchased a very expensive version (different brand) a couple years ago. The chemical smell was awful and lasted a month! This was great right out of the box. We let it air out over night and still couldn't smell anything the next morning. Fairly light and easy to transport across the house and onto a full loft bed. 8" thick, just like ad reads. Looking to buy another for our youngest child's twin bed!
customer_reviews.author: derrick allen

customer_reviews.title: HARD AS A ROCK. HOT. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.text: EXACTLY like sleeping on the floor on top of a spsce heater. Savd yourself money and just make a pallet on the floor to sleep on. Within one night I was getting shooting sciatic pains down my leg because of how hard this thing is. It shouldn't legally be allowed to call it a mattress. I never got hot when sleeping befote and never understood people who daid thdy got hot in their sleep. Well now I do, and I bet they had this mattress. It traps body hest and feels like your wearing a snow suit. I'm back sleeping on my 9 year old spring bed. Which is 100% more comfortable than this Zinus trash.
customer_reviews.author: Evans

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but poorly made
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mattress for my daughter in December 2019. She liked sleeping on it but within a couple of months, material started flaking off and it's slowly disintegrating. I removed it from her bed and it's currently sitting on the floor of a spare room shedding bits of what looks like fiberglass everywhere. Unfortunately, I am outside Amazon's return period and was referred to the manufacturer. There was no answer multiple times when I tried to call, so I sent them a message and am waiting to hear back. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Nick-L

product_meta.title: Zinus 10 Inch Gel-Infused Green Tea Memory Foam Mattress / Cooling Gel Foam / Pressure Relieving / CertiPUR-US Certified / Bed-in-a-Box, Queen
product_meta.description: Size:Queen| Style:10 Inch| Pattern Name:MattressThe Gel-Infused Green Tea Memory Foam Mattress encompasses all the refreshing comfort of our #1 selling green tea mattress with the added temperature control of our specially formulated MyGel memory foam. Packed with antioxidant-rich green tea and natural charcoal, these foam layers work overtime while you sleep, pushing out odor-causing agents so your favorite spot in the house stays cleaner longer. This revitalizing mattress is crafted with skillfully engineered memory and comfort foams that mold to the shape of your body for a customized fit that soothes achy joints. And a top layer of ultra cooling-gel infused memory foam means that your body temperature stays perfectly regulated and that your thermostat will likely thank you. All wrapped in a soft-as-feathers poly jacquard cover and delivered to your door with our 10-year worry free warranty, the highly rated Gel-Infused Green Tea Mattress is “cool” in many more ways than one.
feature_bullets: Gel and Green Tea-infused Memory Foam With a Soft, Poly Jacquard Cover

AS COOL AS IT GETS - Settle in to a bed made with our most cooling formula yet, promising perfectly temperature-regulated sleep and a clean feeling night after night, all thanks to our enveloping memory foam packed with cooling gel and green tea

PRESSURE-RELIEVING FOAMS - 2 inch ultra-cooling gel and green tea infused memory foam, 2.5 inches soft comfort foam, and 5.5 inches durable high density base support foam; ideal for back sleepers and average-weight sleepers
CERTIPUR US CERTIFIED - Highest quality foam is CertiPUR US Certified for durability, performance, and content

EXPERTLY PACKAGED - Our technology allows this mattress to be efficiently compressed into one box that’s easily shipped and maneuvered into the bedroom; simply unbox, unroll and this mattress does the rest, expanding to its original shape within 72 hours
Worry-free 10 year limited warranty included; twin mattress supports a maximum weight of 250 lbs, while all other sizes can support up to 500 lbs

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars20,514 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.Fabric Type: Gel and Green Tea-infused Memory Foam With a Soft, Poly Jacquard Cover
